description.raw:
While building bottles for the latest prerelease of ignition-rendering, it did not build bottles for sierra because that version of macOS is too old (see [`depends_on :macos` line in formula](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/ignition-rendering1.rb#L14)).

* https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/518
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder&build=21)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/21/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/21/

That didn't cause any problems for `brew test-bot`, but we have a check in our build script that will fail if no bottles are built. This was a helpful check, but it should be relaxed now that we have some formulae that don't support old distros. This PR causes the script to exit without failure if no bottles are built. Testing:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder&build=22)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/22/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/22/

UPDATE:

The archive artifacts step complained in build 22, so I've updated the dsl, deployed it, and started another test:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder&build=23)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/23/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/23/

That didn't cause any problems for brew test-bot, but we have a check in our build script that will fail if no bottles are built. This was a helpful check, but it should be relaxed now that we have some formulae that don't support old distros. This PR causes the script to exit without failure if no bottles are built. Testing:

title: Allow bottle builds without artifacts
